mapper.select: select dept_name, dept_no from dept where branch_no = (select branch_no from branch where branch_name=#{branch_name}) and his_check=1
select d.dept_no, d.branch_name, d.dept_name, s.bonus_percent from dept d join set_bonus s on d.dept_no = s.dept_no where his_check='1' and d.dept_no=#{dept_no}
